title: Ecotex® Screen Printing Mesh Degreaser (Quart - 32oz.) - Silk Screen Cleaner, Oil and Residue Remover - Screen Printing Frame Degreaser and Mesh Cleaner, Eco-Friendly Screen Printing Supplies
features: Go Green - Looking for an environmentally safe way to remove grease from your screen printing screens? Look no further than the Ecotex Mesh Degreaser! This screen printing cleaner is biodegradable, drain safe, and non- hazardous. It does the job without harming the mesh in any type of way.
Simple and Easy - This degreaser is extremely easy to use, just simple attach the included spray nozzle and your ready to remove those tough stains. Apply directly to your screen printing frame.

No More Hassle - Maintaining a crispy clean screen printing screen is ideal when it comes to this line of work, especially when your goal is to lay smooth consistent layers of emulsion. Adding this product to your screen printing supplies will not only benefit the coating of your silk screens, but will save you potentially hours of wasted cleaning time.
Removes All Oils and Residues - Find comfort knowing that your screen is completely clean and printing shirts just got a little simpler. Eliminate all pinholes in your screen printing emulsion.
Made in the USA - All of our screen printing cleaning supplies are produced here in the USA and hand-poured by SPD's very finest to ensure quality in every bottle. ADD TO CART NOW.
description: SCREEN PRINT DIRECT Best products. Best Prices. Buy Direct! Ecotex DEGREASER is an environmentally friendly Citrus-Based Screen Printing fabric Degreaser. Tired of oils and residue causing ‘pin holes’ when coating emulsion? Ecotex DEGREASER will economically and safely prepare your screens for emulsion. Key Characteristics: Includes Spray NozzleBiodegradable & Drain Safe Safe For Mesh Non Hazardous Concentrated Simple & Easy To Use Shelf Life: +12 months Have You Tried Our Other Products? - IJFD 5 MIL - Waterproof Inkjet Film Transparency - Ecotex Emulsion Hardener - Ecotex Emulsion Remover - Ecotex Emulsions - & More!
